values: I'm currently remodeling this page.  Stay tuned!

...I wanna go to the Anime Expo 2005!!! O_O I just went to the website for AX 2004 and read everything about it: all the events, contests, special guests, and even the rules and regulations. Everything seems so fun! Although Otakon had better guests like L'ARC EN CIEL!! Too bad it was all the way in Maryland and it already happened.. T3T I've never been to a convention or cosplayed before in my life and it always sounds so much fun when I hear/read about it from people that had experienced it. So I think I'm gonna go to AX 2005. It's supposedly in Anaheim.. it's not that far away.. only 6 hours of driving. Gotta make my costume! I have 7-8 months to prepare! >:) But it's no guarantee I'm gonna make it for sure.

But in other news, I created my very first CG yesterday! It was the title page for TWTYH doujinshi contest. I have a little more than 1 1/2 months left to get it done. I'm planning to get it done by Christmas since it's Christmas theme and all.. ~_~ well there's ONE spoiler!! >) I'm currently plotting the story or... at least trying to. ^_^; Earlier today, I was just sitting at my computer trying to think up a story for this contest and I got something! It was a pretty good beginning too but I decided that it's not really Christmas themed so I decided to use the story for another doujinshi I might do for Emi in summer of 2005 (AX 2005!!!) just for kicks. If I have time. Can't make any promises.. I'm not that good at keeping schedule.

C'mon muse... INSPIRE ME!!!
